description: It’s usually always happens like this so this is no surprise to me at all. Back when Michael Brown was killed, they were paying people to go down to Ferguson, Missouri to riot and loot the stores. There was people literally arriving on buses to loot the stores. There’s something deeper about these types of situations so it’s time for us to start looking behind the curtain and find out what’s really going on, #hollyweirdisevil #georgefloyd
